entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
